featured.text: Soon, it can lead to dizziness, nausea, and vomiting.
Moreover, the effect is often 20 space motion sickness, headaches, and nausea.
You can also take medicine before your ride to avoid or reduce nausea and vomiting.

definition.zh_def: 噁心，通常指想嘔吐的感覺。
definition.en_def: A feeling of sickness with an inclination to vomit.
definition.example: After the roller coaster ride, I felt a wave of nausea.
